akn:subsection.akn:heading: Health Care Information Enterprise Integration Research Centers

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Health Care Information Enterprise Integration Research Centers

akn:subsection.akn:heading: National information technology research and development program

akn:content.akn:p: (b) National information technology research and development program The Networking and Information Technology Research and Development Program established by section 5511 of title 15 shall include Federal research and development programs related to health information technology.
